game.name: KAIBIL
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: KAIBIL is a retro pixel-art RPG set in 1524. As warlord and king of the Mam Mayan tribe, Kaibil struggles to unite the warring and fractured tribes to try and resist the armageddon and save his people.
game.shortDescriptionEn: KAIBIL is a retro pixel-art RPG set in 1524. As warlord and king of the Mam Mayan tribe, Kaibil struggles to unite the warring and fractured tribes to try and resist the armageddon and save his people.
